nodes.caption: Macroeconomic factors that favor entrepreneurship - Availability of financial resources - Governmental policies - Programs for entrepreneurs - Entrepreneurial education and formation - R&D transfers - Market dynamics - Available infrastructures

Microeconomic factors that determine entrepreneurial decisions - Opportunities to entrepreneur - Necessity-driven entrepreneurs - Motivation and calling - Innovation - Managerial and entrepreneurial ability - Formal education - Entrepreneurial spirit - Age, gender, household responsibilities - Perception of entrepreneurship as desirable
Culture and social norms towards entrepreneurship
